item.title: KHC
item.description: score:196 Chances: Kraft Heinz company will release its fourth quarter and full year 2023 financial results on Feb. 14, 2024 Interest in trying different varieties of dairy products is high among U.S. consumers Partnership with NHL and NHLPA for Kraft Hockeyville 2024 nominations Institutions’ substantial holdings in Kraft Heinz implies significant influence over the company Partnership with celebrity designer for 14 Karat Gold VELVEETA Drip Lip Cuff Partnership targeting high-intent grocery shoppers with sign-on from marketers like Danone and Kraft Heinz Risks: Wall Street wasn’t impressed with Kraft Heinz sales trends Kraft Heinz (KHC) closed at $37.
